alert.note: Alert for Northern Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 11 at 12:28PM AKST until November 14 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northern Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible, including along the mouth of the Inmachuk River in Deering. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves will push onshore, especially along west facing shores. Peak water levels will occur Monday night into Tuesday. Sustained south to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph late Sunday night through Monday night will shift to the west on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property. Items on the beach should be moved to higher ground to prevent damage or being washed away.
